name: Adam - Now in 3D
description:
The year is 20xx. The setting, moon. You’re a lonely scientist who has finally fulfilled his grandfather’s wish and built a time machine to uncover the origin of the world. Now go, charge backward, and uncover the mystery while trying to avoid your worst enemy: yourself.

Please note:

  • The are no saves in the game, so be sure to finish it in one shot!

CONTROLS:

  • A, D to move left and right
  • Space to jump
  • E to timejump
  • M to pickup the clock

Credits: Programming: Riccardo Arena, Giuseppe Strano Modeling: Riccardo Arena Music: Giuseppe Strano

Original concept by: Mattia Traverso & Shetty

Astronaut model by Poly, licensed under CC-BY.

THANKS MIXAMO <3
